title: For Sale/Trade:  <> AMERICAN SWEETY! ('Sweet 16', by Remington)<>
location: Not TOO danged far from OKC, Oklahoma City, Oklahoma
postcontent:
This is a late 1930's ('37 or '39 as I recall), Remington Model 11, and was the 1st year model for the redesigned safety. It is the same Browning Design as the Belgian built A-5 'Humpback". 
 The gun is chambered in 2 3/4" 16 ga., and has a Full Choke 28" Ribbed Barrel. The wood, bore & mechanics are excellent, there is NO rust or pitting; but the bluing on the receiver is a bit thin. The barrel is excellent! It has a nice quality old/vintage lace-up leather 'boot' to protect the stock that has never been removed.
 The 16's are rather under appreciated in this country, but are an excellent Gauge for bird & small game hunting. I don't recall what happened the 'Plug' (the wooden dowel in the magazine), but last time I fired this gun I think it was in 7+1 mode, and dumped a 8 rounds very smoothly, accuarately, and scary damned fast!
 Bill Jordan -Designer of the Famed Smith & Wesson Model 19 K frame .357 magnum, used to carry a sawed off Remington Model 11 in 12 ga. to solve 'Border Disputes'. The semi-auto design made it possible to drive & shoot at the same time. Yep, Ol' Bill was somethin'....to not mess with.
 When I was younger, I borrowed the Browning version to hunt Jack Rabbits
at night from a Pickup bouncing through the wheat fields....we lost a lot of rabbits, but not one fender! 
This Browning design, like the 1911acp- is a tried & true CLASSic (with a Capital 'Class')...these things Shoot! But: You probably already know that.
 Poor little birds & bunnies.
I'd like to sell locally, so let me know if you'd like a great ol' 16.

Custom Built AR15s built identical. Chambered in .223 Wylde 
(A .223 Wylde is a hybrid of the .223 and 5.56 chamber. It has a slightly larger chamber and throat than .223 but not quite as open as a 5.56 one. .223 Wylde (IIRC) was made to shoot hotter loads in match grade guns. You can use either .223 or 5.56mm ammo in a .223 Wylde. A .223 Wydle is generally as accurate as a .223 chambered gun and more accurate than a 5.56 chambered weapon.)

CZ 2075 Rami P in 9mm.
***Edit: I forgot to mention. This is the model with the manual safety.***

If you haven't heard of them, look up CZ. If you have, you already know their crazy quality and don't need me to tell you more.

The Rami is specifically designed to be as concealable as possible. It is a single stack 9mm that can disappear just about anywhere. It has gone with me everywhere, but I am leaving the country, can't take it, and need money.

Comes with everything factory and some ammo on the side.

title: For Sale:  Professional Cerakote Firearms Finishing
location: All Kansas & USA, Kansas, United States
postcontent:
!!SALE ON 1911's!! SEP 13-OCT 13 - Business is good, and we want to offer 1911 owners a special deal to have your pistol coated with the world best firearm finish. This offer is good for SINGLE color applicatons, ie; slide 1 color, and frame one color. Camo patterns are not part of this sale.

There seems to be some confusion as to whether the polymer frame of the glock or other brands can be finished with the oven cure Cerakote. 
THE GLOCK POLYMER FRAME,  (and most other brands) CAN BE COATED WITH THE OVEN CURE CERAKOTE WITH NO PROBLEMS WHAT SO EVER. 
The only way to possibly damage the frame, is if the coating is applied by an untrained, unqualified, unlicensed person, who does not have an extensive understanding of coatings and the proper temperatures to use for the surface the coating is being applied to, nor any extensive knowledge of multiple different firearms dis-assembly and re-assembly. 

Only trust your firearms to be worked on by established, experienced, licensed, and insured gunsmiths. We have recently had several firearms brought in for repair or recoating, that were done by "garage" "shade tree"   type persons who felt that because they "tinkered" with their own personal guns, it qualified them to perform work on someone elses firearm. Dont let yourself be put in that situation because a guy offers you "the deal of the century". It can be very costly. 

One unfortunate example of this is, an AR-15 rifle that was brought in by a customer a few weeks ago, who used a "wannabe gunsmith" to coat his rifle. He took the rifle out to shoot, and the round ruptured the chamber in his face due to too heavy a coating being allowed to be applied in places it was not supposed to be, and improper re-assembly procedures. Luckily, the shooter was wearing high grade, USGI eye protection, and walked away with only some minor scars.  

We try very hard to offer our services at very reasonable prices, and still be able to offer them. We welcome you to search around the internet for the coating prices and turnaround times of multiple shops around the US. You will find that we have excellent pricing and turnaroud times, with the utmost professional quality finished products.

We offer discounts for Law Enforcement, Fire, EMS, and Military with current ID.

We offer lightning fast 1-3 day turnaround with affordable pricing.

For customers outside the Wichita area, you can ship the parts you want coated to us, and we can ship it directly back to you at the address you shipped it from. The ATF regulation is shown below:

"Any person may ship firearms directly to a licensee in any State, with no requirement for another licensee to ship the firearm. However, handguns are not mailable through the United States Postal Service and must be shipped via common or contract carrier (UPS, FEDEX).(18 U.S.C. §§ 1715). Firearms shipped to FFLs for repair or any other lawful purpose may be returned to the person from whom received without transferring the firearm through an FFL in the recipient’s State of residence. FFLs may also return a replacement firearm of the same kind and type to the person from whom received. 18 U.S.C. § 922(a)(2)(A)."  

GET YOUR HUNTING FIREARMS IN TIP TOP SHAPE FOR THE UPCOMING SEASONS IN A FEW MONTHS!
Bring your hunting rifle, shotgun, or handgun in for a detailed, fully disassembled cleaning starting at $25.00 and up.

Some of our work can be seen on the Cerakote website: www.cerakoteguncoatings.com/gallery/

Cerakote is a high grade ceramic firearm coating that provides excellent corrosion protection and wear resistance. It is designed for military and law enforcement extreme duty use.

ATF form 4473 and background check required for the purchase of our firearms, unless you hold a valid current Kansas Concealed Carry Permit.

!!GUN SALE UNTIL SEP 30 2012!!: ALL IN STOCK AND SPECIAL ORDER FIREARMS WILL BE SOLD AT ONLY 10% OVER DEALER COST!! WE CAN ORDER MOST BRANDS.

We do FFL Tranfers for $25.00.

Robinson's Hardware is a full service hardware store and federally licensed FFL Dealer/Gunsmith shop, offering pistols, rifles, shotguns, gunsmith services, ammunition, gun accessories, as well as fishing & hunting licenses and supplies, and farm and home equipment, paint and supplies.

For more information please call Patrick at REDACTED - (Please leave message if no answer, equipment may be running at the time you call, and calls from "unknown" or "blocked" will not be answered due to spam calls and telemarketing)

We are open M-F 7:30 to 5:30 and Sat 7:30 to 1:00, Closed on Sun.

We offer competitive pricing and that small town pride in what we do and sell.

Thanks for looking!

title: For Sale:  FN Tactical Police Shotgun
postcontent:
For sale is an FN Tactical Police 12ga Shotgun 7+1.  These were made for a short period of time around 2003-2004.  Many of the one's you would find these days were assembled by SGC from belmish FN parts.  These are marked with an X by the serial number.  However this is a TRUE FN Manufactured gun which is pretty rare.  

Gun is coated in FDE baked on finish, has a Magpul Moe grip (takes any AR grip), and I put a real AR buttstock on it (comes with a small version).  Both original parts are included. Original box also included!
Also included is a C-More red dot which this gun was factory drilled and tapped for to co-witness with iron sights.  The C-More SRTPS cost $300 new.

This is a very unique shotgun, I doubt you'll find another one, let alone a real FN manufactured one to many places.  There's not even one on Gunbroker.  

Seller has HCP, Buyer must be 18, TN resident, and legally able to buy firearms

Trades:  May consider an Arsenal AK, FNSLP Mark1 or Gen 4 Glock 19 or 17 w/night sights, well equipped or plus a little cash.

title: For Sale:  1944 Finnish M39 **needs work**
postcontent: For sale is a Finnish M39, I bought as a project rifle to fix up. Need to pay bills instead. Price is $200 FIRM. I have more than that in the rifle, and if I do not get $200 to pay my current bills, I will just keep it and fix it up later. This is a wartime M39, Sako, barrel date 1944, unsure of the tang date as I have not disassembled it fully yet. Bore does have some wear, lands look okay, some pitting on the grooves. Blue is about 30% maybe. It needs; bolt handle, extractor, ejector/interuptor, magazine floor plate, both front and rear action screws, rear site slide, front sight blade and screws. If you have an old beat up M91/30 that would do as some parts would just swap over. I have not fired the rifle since buying, so have a competent gunsmith look at any used firearm before shooting. I am in Westminster, Carroll County, Maryland. Need to see a MD drivers license to make sure you are a MD resident. I work 8-5 M-F then rush home to get kids from daycare, and some Saturdays, so I cannot travel too far. Any questions, just ask. The parts for these M39s are all over Gunbroker or Ebay. The sights have been around $15 each, the screws $10. Extractors about 9.99, and bolt handles vary, but it may be easier to just swap anothr Mosin bolt. This one has a bent bolt, but the bent handle is loose, so could just use a weld. This has a Sako wartime stock with rounded joint fingers. Thanks for looking!

postcontent:
For sale is a .338 Lapua Magnum Custom built by Accuracy Systems Inc.  The Rifle was built using the world renowned Remington 700 Long 300 RUM Action in Matte Black with a 28” x 1.220 UMCM 1x10 twist barrel which contains an 11 degree target crown, a 2 port Maxi Muzzle brake and Barrel Fluting. The bolt is a Magnum Tactical with Sako Style extractor and Tactical Knob. The Trigger is a single stage trigger set at 2.5 lbs but feels lighter. All of this is mounted on an HS Precision PST 26 stock with a Full Aluminum bedding block with adjustable length of pull and Cheek rest with decelerator recoil pad. The bottom metal is HS Precision Trigger Housing with three (3) seven (7) round magazines. The optics rest on an McCann Industries MIRS Mount (MIRS = McCann Industries Integrated Rail System) which has a 20 MOA base.  The Manufacturer promised a Sub MOA Guarantee however I have achieved Sub half MOA groups after the barrel break in period was over. I have over $4,000 invested in this Rifle however due to a financial hardship I must part with most of my collection. I will throw in 40 Rounds of CorBon 225 Grain ammo. title: Want To Buy:  Quality AR-15 in 5.56 Nato
postcontent:
Looking to buy a standard, bare bones AR-15, chambered in 5.56 Nato, not .223, 1:9 to a 1:7 twist.  Please don't tell me there is no difference between the two chamberings, but a Wylde chamber would be just fine as well.  I'd prefer it be in the standard M16-A2 version, with carrying handle, adj. rear sights, front sight w/bayonet lug, solid butt stock, long hand grips/forestock.  As a retired Marine, I'd like to continue shooting what feels right, and the old tried and true A2 style feels right.  A flat top with a detachable carry handle would work, so long as I still have my front and rear iron sights with a bayonet lug.  Will consider all brands and versions, but I have my preferences as stated, and lean towards Stag/Colt/Spikes/Armalite/LMT, on recommendations from across the internet.  I'm not looking to target shoot with this rifle, I want a rifle that will do what you expect it to, under all conditions, just as an AR/M16 should.  It'll probably never see 200 rounds by me firing it, but whether it is 200 rounds this year, or 20 years from now, I need it to go bang, not click, every single time the trigger is pulled, (without aid of the charging handle and/or forward assist) ;)

Email REDACTED with brand and price.

title: For Sale:  Ruger SR9c
postcontent:
Ruger SR9c

2010 NRA Handgun of the year as this is one of the lowest recoil and thinnest grips on a double stack 9mm striker fire. Comes with case, 12rd and 17rd clips, lock, magazine loader, and a new in the bag Fobus 360 belt  holster. Never carried. Asking $512 obo (or best offer) REDACTED text or call. 

The MSRP on these is $512 but this is technically used so feel free to make an offer. Trades are welcome if you have something of value.

These are ideal for people who don't like the bulk of a glock, but love the functionality and want a thinner grip. These are also very thin for a double stack so if you're carrying inside the waistband you get the feel and fit of a slim or single stack without sacrificing your round count. title: For Sale/Trade:  Arsenal SLR 95 AK 47
postcontent:
One of the best AKs on the market.    Very rare AK variant.  Completely Bulgarian made.  Not assembled from parts kit.  Very sturdy AK.  

Steyr hammer forged chrome lined barrel.  Comes with US issue 2 point sling.  2 mags.  Arsenal no longer makes this model.  The closest thing to it in the market is the SA M7 which is close to $2k.  

These AKs are getting hard to find and Century WASRs are getting expensive.  I shot this AK last week alongside many other AKs including WASRs, SARs, Polish, Converted Saigas, Chinese, and other Arsenals.  This was the best shooting AK of the bunch.  Easiest to control and by far the most accurate.  Finish has minor imperfections here and there but nothing major.

Tactical innovations upper and lower receivers
RRA chromed bolt carrier group
RRA lower parts kit with JP Enterprises enhanced reliability spring kit (brings trigger weight down to about 4.5-5 pounds),

YHM low-profile gas block and gas tube
RRA pistol buffer tube, buffer, and buffer spring

title: For Trade:  In case of Zombies, kick @$$!
location: Youngstown Warren Akron Mansfield Lima, Cleveland, Ohio
postcontent:
Zombie Killer Smith & Wesson Tactical M&P 15-22 with MANY accessories; Magpul, NDZ, Tacticool, Tasco and more!

This is an early model, low serial number (ending in 30) S&W M&P 15-22 with MANY accessories and upgrades. I am not interested in selling this rifle, just trading as I have another interest. The only things I’m interested in trading this rifle for is an AR- style 9MM or 45 ACP pistol that I can turn into an SBR (so no Kel Tec or Sig’s please),  a 16” 9MM rifle or an AR style  5.56, .223, 5.45 or other  caliber AR style pistol, carbine or rifle. Please don’t contact me and offer me cash or non firearm related items as I am only interested in trading for another AR. 

The rifle is in very good overall shape with minor wear. The rounds count is about 1200-1500 rounds and it fires FLAWLESSLY. All the springs were upgraded early in its life by S&W as some of this line of  rifles had issues with misfires when they first appeared on the scene. This rifle loves all types of .22 ammo so it will eat whatever you feed it. :) It’s a real tack driver as I can put five rounds in a target the size of a nickel at 100 yards with this scope. The scope is a range finder scope with a dual red and green display with multiple brightness settings. If you don’t know what a range finding scope looks like, imagine a mil-dot scope with a small football field on the bottom of the glass. This small football field is similar to a golf scope and helps you estimate how far the target is when at an unknown distance. I will include all instructions for the scope, rifle and accessories. 

It turns heads at the range and I am always asked to see it and what I’ve done to it. I’ve had it on here for a few weeks, and have had a number of offers, but most of them have been from people too far away not willing to travel. I am willing to travel for the right deal, but would love for someone to meet me half way. If you’re having a hard time selling your AR, this might be a good trade as you could flip this one easily since these rifles are in high demand. You could also part this out as the accessories on here are worth over $500 in total.

This rifle includes the following:
 •S&W M&P 15-22 rifle 
 oUpgraded trigger and bolt springs
 oSix position collapsible stock
 oOriginal box
 oOriginal instructions
 •Eight original S&W 25 round magazines 
 •2 OD Green Magpul rubber magazine pulls
 •Original black pistol grip and butt stock
 •Tacti-Cool muzzle adopter 
 •DSG Arms AR-15 A2 muzzle compensator
 •Quad rail fore end
 •OD Green Gun Tec 6”-9” collapsible/extendable bipod with rubber feet 
 •10 OD Green Magpul XTM rail covers 
 •OD Green Gen 1 Magpul Advanced Fore Grip (AFG) 
 •OD Green Magpul MOE pistol grip 
 •OD Green Magpul Gen 1 front backup site 
 •OD Green Magpul Gen 1 rear backup site 
 •OD Green Magpul MOE butt stock 
 •Magpul Batter Assist Device (BAD) Lever 
 •NC Star Tactcal laser with pressure switch (not pictured) 
 •NDZ Zombie Hunter magazine release lever 
 •NDZ oversized Zombie Hunter magazine release button 
 •NDZ Zombie Hunter receiver pin front and rear 
 •OD Green Tasco 2x6x32 range estimating scope 
 oRed/Green illuminated reticle
 oOriginal OD Green scope rings
 o1” black scope rings
 o½” quick release Weaver rail riser 

One thing to consider is that many of these parts can be installed on most AR platforms, (the stock is commercial width). I am willing to drive to Youngstown, Warren, Akron, Cleveland, Mansfield or even Columbus for the right deal, but the further away from the Youngstown area, the better the deal should be for me :).  When you contact me, include pictures, condition and other information about your trade. Please email me if interested and thanks for looking. If we can strike a deal, I will send you my number so we can begin the negotiations

Dave

title: For Sale/Trade:  Brand New Springfield XDS (45ACP)
postcontent:
I have a new and unfired XD-S.  It offers Superior innovation in the palm of your hand. This slim, powerful addition to the XD line delivers all the performance of a.45 expertly engineered to fit in any size hand. 

At only 1" wide, the XD-Sfits as perfectly into your concealed-carry strategy as it does in the palm of your hand. And with it, you get the power of a .45 with superior control and comfort without sacrificing important safety features. The unique combination of an ultra-slim profile paired with enhanced performance point-and-shoot features allows you to shoot accurately without having to adjust your wrist giving you greater control. 

Prepare to be impressed with the single-position Picatinny rail that puts lights and lasers within easy reach. With an eye toward detail, the low-profile rear and fiber-optic front sights are specifically designed to allow you to quickly zero in on your target. 

This powerful pistol includes the Ultra Safety Assurance (USA)Action Trigger System, loaded chamber indicator and grip safety. In addition, the XD-S offers a top-of-the-line, enhanced secure grip texture for greater control and usability. The XD-S disassembles just like the XD, however, with the XD-S, the disassembly lever cannot be manipulated with a magazine in the pistol. Additionally, when the disassembly lever is up, a magazine cannot be inserted into the pistol.
